name: Pot Luck 3 Quiz | Mixed 10 Questions | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was known as the 'Wild Bull of Pampas'?
In what year was the first Indianapolis 500 held?
In the movie 'Bringing Up Baby', what was baby?
What were the names of the 'Hardy Boys'?
Who had the hit song 'April Love'?
In what city did 'The Lawman' take place?
What city is known as the 'City of Five Flags'?
questions.explanation:
Pensacola.

	At one time or another it belonged to Spain, France, Great Britian, Confederate States of America and the USA.

questions.text: What car is called the 'Flying Teapot'?
How many teeth does Ollie Dragon have?
